Compute Pairwise Cohen\'s d and P-Values

compute_cohen_d.Rd

Computes Cohen\'s d effect sizes and corresponding p-values for all pairwise comparisons of a grouping variable in a data frame.

Usage

compute_cohen_d(
  dfScore,
  variable,
  quantitative_var = "score",
  mode = c("simple", "medium", "extensive")
)

Arguments

dfScore

A data frame containing at least one numeric column and a grouping variable. Output from flatten_results.

variable

A string specifying the name of the categorical grouping column in dfScore.

quantitative_var

A string specifying the name of the numeric column (default is "score").

Value

A data frame with the following columns:

Group1

The first group in the pair.

Group2

The second group in the pair.

CohenD

The computed Cohen\'s d effect size for the comparison.

PValue

The p-value from a t-test comparing the two groups.
